Hypomania

A short college project done in a week.

Controls: WASD - Move Left Click - Interact Right Click - Shoot Enter - Exit to title

Goal: Collect the purple orbs scattered around the map (Max 2 on the map at a time) and put them into the key hole at the starting position. You can avoid the enemies roaming the maze, or (if you have collected any purple orbs) you can shoot them with right click.

Based on another game I made (arguably worse)
